channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Obama aids Democrats in campaign stops ahead of 2025 elections
item.description: In the final weekend before Election Day, several Democratic candidates and surrogates are using Trump as a foil to drum up support.

item.title: Voters divided on midterms despite broad Trump disapproval, poll finds
item.description: Most Americans disapprove the president’s handling of top issues, and a majority say he has gone too far in exercising his powers.

item.title: Trump threatens potential military action in Nigeria, says aid will cease
item.description: The move is an escalation in the president’s campaign against the West African country’s government over allegedly failing to protect Christians.

item.title: Scoop: Trump pours millions into Virginia, New Jersey races
item.description: President Trump's political operation is digging into its massive war chest to bankroll a multimillion-dollar voter turnout effort in the final days o...

item.title: Trump shutdown workarounds test a 150-year-old law
item.description: As the Trump administration deploys creative ways to keep parts of the government open without congressional approval , it runs the risk of colliding ...

item.title: What's next for the Big Tech stocks?
item.description: Data: Financial Modeling Prep ; Chart: Axios Visuals Five of the Magnificent 7 reported earnings this week, and all but Meta had a positive stock move...

item.title: Syrian president expected to meet Trump at the White House, U.S. envoy says
item.description: Syrian President Ahmed al-Sharaa is planned to visit Washington on November 10 and is expected to meet President Trump at the White House, U.S. envoy ...

item.title: Clocks fall back Sunday with an "extra hour" — but Congress remains split on time change
item.description: Americans "fall back" early Sunday — gaining an hour of sleep as Congress stays gridlocked over daylight saving time . Why it matters: The latest push...

item.title: Trump isn’t acting confident about the 2025 elections
item.description: The president is keeping a distance from some Republican candidates and signaling some pessimism about next Tuesday’s contests.

item.title: Governor races showcase a Democratic class that bolstered party’s bench
item.description: Once hailed as “majority makers,” Democrats who won in 2018 have risen up the ranks and are aiming for a spot on the national ticket.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
